translation.包括鎖定和常用報時: Includes saved and common use ETA
translation.請捐款到 612 人道支援基金: Please donate to 612 Humanitarian Relief Fund
translation.home-page-description: Ad-free mobile application for checking bus routes, stops, estimated time of arrival(ETA) of Kowloon Motor Bus Co. (KMB), Long Win Bus (LWB), CityBus (CTB), New World First Bus (NWFB) and New Lantao Bus (NLB) - HK Bus ETA App
translation.route-board-page-description: Simple & clean route searching interface to search over 1800 routes and 8800 stops among Kowloon Motor Bus Co. (KMB), Long Win Bus (LWB), CityBus (CTB), New World First Bus (NWFB) and New Lantao Bus (NLB), covering Hong Kong Island, Kowloon, New Territories and Lantau Island - HK Bus ETA App
translation.setting-page-description: Renew the database, clean up usage record, check out the source code, join the telegram sharing group and donate - HK Bus ETA App
translation.route-search-page-description: Point-to-Point route search across Kowloon Motor Bus Co. (KMB), Long Win Bus (LWB), CityBus (CTB), New World First Bus (NWFB) and New Lantao Bus (NLB) - HK Bus ETA App
translation.安裝巴士預報 App 到裝置: Install HK BUS ETA into your device
translation.右上選項: Tap the menu icon (3 dots in the upper right-hand corner)
translation.新增至主畫面 / 安裝應用程式: Add to Home screen / Install the app
translation.Route Search caption 2: Max. walking distance is 500m between each location
translation.Route Search caption 3: Verified scheduled bus in the first terminal

translation.home-page-description: 無廣告手機應用程式查閱巴士線、車站、預計到達時間，路線盡包九龍巴士(九巴)、龍運巴士、新世界第一巴士(新巴)、城巴、新大嶼山巴士 - 巴士到站預報 App
translation.route-board-page-description: 透過簡潔清晣的搜尋介面，輕鬆查找九巴、龍運、新巴、城巴、新大嶼山巴士合共超過 1800 條巴士路線，8800 個車站，路線覆蓋港島、九龍、新界、大嶼山 - 巴士到站預報 App
translation.setting-page-description: 重置巴士路線資料，刪除使用記錄，查看原始碼，加入 Telegram 交流群組，亦可捐款支持 - 巴士到站預報 App
translation.route-search-page-description: 點對點搜尋可行巴士線，合理步距下，橫誇九巴、龍運、新巴、城巴、新大嶼山巴士的巴士線 - 巴士到站預報 App
translation.Route Search description: 搜尋由起點到終點的路線
translation.Route Search caption 2: 起點終點和車站之間的最大步行距離 500m
translation.Route Search caption 3: App 亦會確認路線頭站有即將出發的車，以減少過量的搜尋結果
